verbs.description: restage (third-person singular simple present restages, present participle restaging, simple past and past participle restaged)

entries.meaning: (theater, transitive) To stage (a production) again; to bring (a production) to the stage again.
(medicine, oncology, surgery; transitive) To stage (a disease, especially a cancer) again; to revise the staging of a case as its course varies.
